type.name: MaterialCollection

property.name: Count
property.summary: Gets the number of materials in this collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Creates a new Material based on the specified form item and count and adds it to this collection.

method.name: Add
method.summary: Adds an existing Material to this collection.

method.name: Clear
method.summary: Removes all Materials from this collection.

method.name: Remove
method.summary: Removes a Material from this collection.

type.remarks: Materials in a collection can be edited or removed within a foreach iteration.
